Text: C'mon! You won't win with defense alone!
...Urgh! I know that!

(It looks like she's stuck on the defensive, but this
is different than before... Her eyes tell me she's
focused on the battle, waiting for her chance.)
(This time, you just might have it...)
You're leaving yourself way too open, maggot!
C'mon, come at me like you want me dead!
My magic control...is ready!
Haaah!!!
Lambda is knocked back by Number 666.

She can see that the girl's sword is filled with just
the right amount of magic for its form.

So you were fending me off while focusing on your
magic control, huh. Not bad.
I'm just getting started...!

(That was just me putting the things I've learned
thus far into practice. Overcoming what comes next
will be the real challenge!)

(Cast aside Rose Oriana! Cast aside all those happy
memories, the sad ones, the future that awaited her!)

(Cast aside Alexia and Natsume, those she swore to
fight alongside! Cast aside the father who raised her
with such care! And...)

(Cast aside Cid, the first and surely last person she
will ever love!)

(All you memories I couldn't bring myself to be rid
of until the very end... I am doing away with Rose so
I can become Number 666. And that is why...)
...I bid you farewell.

Number 666's slime sword transforms, as responding to her
words.

Her slime sword is responding to her magic?!
Its blade is growing thin and pointed, like aâ€”
...Haah!!!
Urk!

Number 666's sword moves with much more speed and
force than Lambda anticipated, crushing her defenses.
Urgh!
Now!

With Lambda off balance, Number 666 moves to deliver
a powerful blow. But Lambda produces a slime sword of
her own to intercept Rose.
Wha...?! I was so close!
You had me for a second there!

But I'm not just an instructor in title alone!
I'll take everything you can throw at me
and return it tenfold!
I'm not done... Not by a long shot!

Number 666 swings her sword with increasing vigor,
driving Lambda back.
(Come on, sword...hit! Hit...! HIT!!!)
Haaaaaaahhhhh!!!
Yaaaaaaah!!!

The refined magic clashes together, bathing the area
in blinding light.
Did I...get her?
What...happened?

...She lost consciousness the moment she let off that
last attack.

Her body had probably already reached its limit and
was moving off pure adrenaline. Too bad, she might
have landed a hit if she'd able to last a bit longer.

That's why I told her...rest is another skill to
master.
Still...well done.

She showed a lot of improvement. More than I
had anticipated...

Hmph, only because she was so awful before. I'd say
she only just now became worth even acknowledging.

Her stamina and skills still need a lot of work.
Send her out into the field as she is now and
she's a goner. That's why I'll begin training
her tomorrow.

So does that mean...you accept her as a member
of the Shadow Garden?
Hmph! Just get that unconscious idiot inside.
Yes, ma'am, as you wish.

Hmph... This is the first time a recruit has ever
given me such a headache.
(My eyes won't open... Guess I really overdid it.)
(Goodbye, Rose Oriana...the old me.)
(Does this mean...I've been reborn?)
(Was I able to prove my strength...?)
Oh hey, Nu. Why're you carrying Rose?

Ah, it's rare to see you back at the Garden, my lord.
She just finished training with Lambda.

Man, she looks really banged up. Hope Lambda didn't
go too hard on her. Ah well, I've gotten carried away
too, so I guess it happens.
Anyways, good work, guys.

(I swore that I was going to forget...but I can still
recall your voice even now.)
(You at least...I want to remember always...)
